item.title: Battletoads, Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos, Bionic Commando, and Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters are now available on Nintendo Classics
item.description: Battletoads (NES), Ninja Gaiden II: The Dark Sword of Chaos (NES), Bionic Commando (Game Boy), and Kid Icarus: Of Myths and Monsters (Game Boy) are now available on Nintendo Classics
